lead_paragraph: The authorities in southwest China have reportedly detained two relatives of a prominent Tibetan monk whose unexplained death in prison set off protests that left dozens injured after it was announced on Monday.

headline.main: China: 2 Relatives of a Tibetan Monk Who Died in Prison Have Been Arrested
headline.print_headline: China: 2 Relatives of a Tibetan Monk Who Died in Prison Have Been Arrested

snippet: The authorities in southwest China have reportedly detained two relatives of a prominent Tibetan monk whose unexplained death in prison set off protests that left dozens injured after it was announced on Monday.
